name: floaty
title: Floaty
description: Control Floaty from Raycast to list, pin, and manage windows.
author: fayecat

commands.name: list-windows
commands.title: List Windows
commands.subtitle: Show windows Floaty can pin or unpin
commands.description: Fetch the latest window list from Floaty and toggle pins right from Raycast.

commands.name: show-main-window
commands.title: Show Main Window
commands.subtitle: Open Floaty's main window
commands.description: Bring the Floaty main window to the front without touching the mouse.

commands.name: select-window-to-pin
commands.title: Select Window to Pin
commands.subtitle: Trigger Floaty's selection flow
commands.description: Start Floaty's selection overlay so you can choose a window to pin.

commands.name: unpin-or-restore-all-windows
commands.title: Unpin or Restore All Windows
commands.subtitle: Toggle all pinned Floaty windows
commands.description: Unpin or restore every Floaty window with a single command.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
